page.title: 10LOCAL BUSINESSES CONTINUED
page.content: Trip to Norwich. You can hire coaches to take children on school visits and other things like that. They also go abroad to other places in Europe.There is a big workshop and a special place outside where the buses and coaches are washed. Over the road from the school is a road haulage company . It is where the old station used to be. The station was closed down in about 1956 and there are only a few bits left. The firm has 23 lorries and they run on diesel and there are 34 trailers and a livestock lorry. There is a workshop and an office and a place for washing down the vehicles. The lorry drivers travel all over the country and some of them go about 1200 miles a week.
